Detailed Description

Represents an static text control that is clickable as a URL.

When clicked, the default browser is loaded to the URL specified by the label, using Application::OpenUrl.

Currently this class is used only by the AboutDialog.

See also:
Application::OpenUrl

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

wxWindowID  id,
const wxString &  label 
)

Creates a new control with a parent window, id and label representing the URL.

Parameters:
parent the parent window
id the window identifier
label the URL this control represents. The browser will be opened to the value set by the label.
